name: Little Mages
description:
Defend your castle from various hordes of enemies that seek to invade it!

Little Mages is a casual pixel art game with roguelite elements where you accumulate knowledge and learn powerful spells of your choice to defeat all your enemies.

Different waves of enemies will attack your castle, each with its own theme, enemies, and even bosses!

But don't rush, because even if you fail the first time, you can always go back in time and try again, now with your knowledge saved
